title: 300+ PING LAG SPIKE AFTER PATCHING
body: UGHHHHHH why is this happening, as i enter game, i have a constant high ping and the lag is killing me. This started happening after the latest patch and its driving me crazy! help please :(

replies.body:
The servers are currently pooping themselves. Maybe they'll get better if we wait a bit.

In the meantime, what OS are you on and who's your ISP?
hi hi! thanks for your response :) ermmm os x and optus :S

Read over [this](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#section-mac) page and see if trying out those things fixes it up for you. Of course, waiting until not nearly as many other people are also getting lag would be your best option, but it kinda sucks just sitting around and doing nothing.

If you need any help with doing that, just ask.

Best of luck.
